text: Rajendra Chandrika (born 8 August 1989) is a West Indian first-class cricketer. In May 2015 he was named in the 14-man Test squad to face Australia. He made his Test debut in the second Test of the series on 11 June at Sabina Park, Kingston. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Guyanese cricketers Category:West Indies Test cricketers Category:Guyana cricketers Category:People from Demerara-Mahaica
title: Rajendra Chandrika
